name: Anyplace Tic Tac Toe. Noughts & crosses game 5x5
name_original: Anyplace Tic Tac Toe. Noughts & crosses game 5x5
description:
ANYPLACE TIC TAC TOE - the best way to kick your friend's ... in a smart way!
Tough combat on a Tic Tac Toe field!
From the guys that brought you ANYPLACE MAFIA and ANYPLACE POKER!

But leave classic 3x3 field for kids! Try serious stuff - (almost) endless playing field. You need to place 5 symbols (noughts or crosses) in one row to win.

- Awesome design in ANYPLACE MAFIA style!
- Develops your logic and strategic thinking!
- Competition and excitement!
- Friendly interface!
- Simple rules!
- NO ADS!
